channel.title: ballin on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ballin on Barefoot Rob

item.title: saying goodbye to the big green ball
item.description: 14:08 Wednesday 30 December 2015 JST A week ago, Lin asked me to fix the screen door before the end of the year. I said I’ll do it or she gets an hour massage. She also asked that I release the big green yoga ball, which has become… how do we say in English.. gross and sticky. I took the ball out to the park and let dust cover the sticky bits so it was no longer so sticky.
